title: (x) What is this light serif font? / Humanist slab - TheSerif {Mike Y}
content:
Hey all,  
Any idea what this serif is? I thought perhaps it was a version of rockwell but I was incorrect. Having trouble figuring this one out!

cheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204220557/http:/typophile.com/files/font_175.jpg) | 2.64 KB |
author: joesomebody

comments.content:
It's [TheSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204220557/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/lucasfonts/theserif_classic/?&sample_text=building) by Luc(as) de Groot.

- Mike Yanega
